entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
